description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
              

              •	Attractive salary and quarterly recognition bonus.
              
              •	Annual health care & insurance, extra leaves.
              
              •	Flexible working time, offer English & IT courses.
              

              The Job
              


              What You Will Do
              

              •	Install, configure and maintain the software test environment.
              
              •	Design, develop and execute test cases on component/integration and e2e level to ensure product quality.
              
              •	Write and maintain clear, precise bug reports to submit to the bug tracking system.
              
              •	Work with development teams to reproduce and resolve problems.
              
              •	Create test documentation in support of manual exploratory testing.
              
              •	Estimate time required to complete planned testing.
              
              •	Analyze defects and test results to be able to deduct the chain of events leading to a failure.
              
              •	Active participation in Agile Scrum sprint testing, regression testing, demonstrations and solution releases.
              
              •	Proactively work with members of the Agile team.
              
              •	Contribute to continuous quality assurance improvement.
              

              •	13th salary is paid before Lunar New Year.
              
              •	English and IT courses.
              
              •	Sport cost for employee (badminton, football, swimming, etc.)
              
              •	Team building activities including: company dinner, company tour once a quarter, 4-day company tour once a year.
              
              •	Premium health care & insurance programs.
              
              •	 Support annual health check-up for all employees.
              
              •	15 days vacation per year.
              
              •	 And other good benefits
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Your Skills and Experience
              

              •	1+ years of software development and testing experience.
              
              •	A degree in computer science, engineering, or equivalent experience
              
              •	Experience in clarifying feature requirements with PMs, developers and businesses in a very dynamic and fast paced environment.
              
              •	Ability to perform system-wide root cause analyses and drive improvements.
              
              •	Ability to influence and drive quality across teams, locations and organizations.
              
              •	Good understanding of relational database design and transactional SQL and DBMS (Oracle, MSSQL).
              
              •	Good English skills in reading, writing and speaking.
              
              •	Excellent logical thinking ability, good problem solving, collaboration, and communication skills.
              
              •	Be active and willing to learn and adapt new technologies.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Attractive salary and quarterly recognition bonus.
               







                Annual health care & insurance, extra leaves.
               







                Flexible working time, offer English & IT courses.
